attributes.name: interactive
attributes.description: Defines if the avatar is interactive (focusable).

attributes.name: initials
attributes.description:
Defines the displayed initials.
Up to three Latin letters can be displayed as initials.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Defines whether the component is disabled.
A disabled component can't be pressed or
focused, and it is not in the tab chain.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Defines the icon, displayed as graphical element within the component.

attributes.name: htmlType
attributes.description: Defines whether the button has special form-related functionality.

events.name: change
events.description: Fired when the component checked state changes.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Defines whether the component is disabled.

attributes.name: indeterminate
attributes.description: Defines whether the component is displayed as partially checked.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description:
Defines if the component is checked.

Note: The property can be changed with user interaction, either by cliking/tapping on the component, or by pressing the Enter or Space key.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Defines the text of the component.

attributes.name: headerText
attributes.description: Defines the header text.

events.name: change
events.description: Fired when the value of the component changes at each keystroke.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Defines whether the component is in disabled state.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description:
Defines a short hint intended to aid the user with data entry when the
component has no value.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Defines the value of the component.

attributes.name: defaultValue
attributes.description: Defines the default value of the component.

attributes.name: valueState
attributes.description: Defines the value state of the component.

attributes.name: valueStateMessage
attributes.description: Defines the value state message that will be displayed as pop up under the component.

attributes.name: allowClear
attributes.description: If allow to remove input content with clear icon.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Defines the HTML type of the component.

attributes.name: for
attributes.description: Defines the labeled input by providing its ID.

attributes.name: showColon
attributes.description: Defines whether colon is added to the component text.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description:
Defines whether an asterisk character is added to the component text.

Note: Usually indicates that user input (bound with the for property) is required. In that case the required property of the corresponding input should also be set.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Defines whether the component is disabled.

Note: When disabled, the click event cannot be triggered by the user.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Defines the component href.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
Defines the component target.

Notes: This property must only be used when the href property is set.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Defines the value of the component.

attributes.name: headerText
attributes.description: Defines the header text.

attributes.name: placement
attributes.description: Determines on which side the component is placed at.

attributes.name: hideArrow
attributes.description: Determines whether the component arrow is hidden.

attributes.name: headerText
attributes.description: Defines the header text.

attributes.name: horizontalAlign
attributes.description: Determines the horizontal alignment of the component.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Specifies the numerical value in percent for the length of the component. Note: If a value greater than 100 is provided, the percentValue is set to 100. In other cases of invalid value, percentValue is set to its default of 0.

events.name: change
events.description: Fired when the value of the component changes at each keystroke.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Indicates whether the user can interact with the component or not.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Defines a short hint intended to aid the user with data entry when the component has no value.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Defines the value of the component.

attributes.name: defaultValue
attributes.description: Defines the default value of the component.

attributes.name: valueState
attributes.description: Defines the value state of the component.

attributes.name: valueStateMessage
attributes.description: Defines the value state message that will be displayed as pop up under the component.

attributes.name: growing
attributes.description: Enables the component to automatically grow and shrink dynamically with its content.
